definitions.definition: Fussy ; particular ; demanding to have things just right.
examples: I am very picky about the way my kitchen is laid out.

definitions.definition: Of food or a meal: consisting of various small items from which the diner can pick and choose.

main_definition: Fussy ; particular ; demanding to have things just right.
secondary_definitions: ( UK , colloquial , not comparable ) Of food or a meal: consisting of various small items from which the diner can pick and choose.
